{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of gummies and y be the number of pills the boy should eat, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "3x + 2y \leq 200",
        "4x + 5y \leq M",
        "y \geq 10",
        "x \geq 3y",
        "x, y \geq 0, integers"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 4x + 5y"
}
